levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases slightly</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; attacks <$ba.stun>Stun</> targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds (<@ba.vup>{attack@stun_main}</> seconds for the primary target). After every attack, splash area <@ba.vup>expands</> and Pepe gets an additional <@ba.vup>+{attack@atk:0%}</> ATK, stacking up to 4 times
